column1: Make sure to tick "Enabled" for any of the below settings to take effect.
column2: 勾选下面的“启用”来让设置生效。

column1: These below settings are separate and do not require "Enabled" to be ticked.
column2: 这个设置会一直生效，无需点击上面的“启用”
界面显示/隐藏是否保存
使用应用程序时间刻度
上次报错时间: %.2f 秒前

column1: Please drop the %s file into the game's directory if you want to use %s
column2: 请把 %s文件放入游戏目录，如果要使用 %s

column1: WARNING: Hardware-accelerated GPU scheduling is enabled. This will cause the game to run slower.
column2: 警告：已启用硬件加速GPU调度。这将导致游戏运行较慢。

column1: Go into your Windows Graphics settings and disable "Hardware-accelerated GPU scheduling"
column2: 进入Windows图形设置并禁用“硬件加速GPU调度”

column1: Resolution can be changed in SteamVR
Makes the UI transparent when not focused.
column2: 让REF在未选中时变得透明。

column1: Allows mouse and keyboard inputs to register to the game while the UI is focused.
column2: 让鼠标能够穿过REF界面点击到游戏内。

column1: This menu will close after initialization if you have the remember option enabled.
column2: 如果启用了“保存”选项，此菜单将在初始化后关闭。
